meanings.sent1: The jargonelle was the perfect size for a quick snack.
meanings.sent2: I enjoyed the taste of the jargonelle pear.
meanings.sent3: The jargonelle pear rolled off the table and made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as sweet as a jargonelle pear.
meanings.sent5: The jargonelle pear sparkled in the sunlight like a tiny gem.

meanings.sent1: The jargonelle tree in our garden always bears delicious fruit.
meanings.sent2: We planted a new jargonelle in the orchard this spring.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel climbed the jargonelle tree and stole some pears.
meanings.sent4: The jargonelle tree stood tall, its branches reaching for the sky.
meanings.sent5: The leaves of the jargonelle tree rustled in the gentle breeze.

meanings.definition: Pertaining to or characteristic of a jargonelle pear.
meanings.sent1: The jargonelle flavor was evident in the dessert.
meanings.sent2: She used jargonelle pears to make a delicious pie.
meanings.sent3: The jargonelle aroma filled the kitchen and made everyone hungry.
meanings.sent4: Her dress was the color of a ripe jargonelle pear.
meanings.sent5: The painting captured the essence of a jargonelle pear perfectly.
